mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company (com_mem_idx, com_name, com_ceo_name, com_license_num, com_address, com_zipCode, com_opening_date) VALUES (#{comMemIdx}, #{comName}, #{comCeoName}, #{comLicenseNum},#{comAddress},#{comZipcode},#{comOpeningDate})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM company WHERE com_license_num = #{comLicenseNum}
